| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                     |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | No                                                             |

| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 1450                                                           |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 400                                                            |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | medium                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                |
| An inmate:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* lets you close unless attacked.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                |

The **inmate** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") added in the [Convict patch](/wiki/Convict "Convict"), implemented in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [DynaHack](/wiki/DynaHack "DynaHack"), [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). The inmate is the [Convict quest](/wiki/Convict_quest "Convict quest") [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian").

Despite their name and status, inmates do not count as [prisoners](/wiki/Prisoner "Prisoner") who can be [freed to raise your alignment record](/wiki/Alignment_record#Ways_to_alter_your_alignment "Alignment record").

## References

Reference: [Karl Garrison's Convict Patch](http://nethack.edeca.net/karl/nethack-convict-0.7.diff)
html:
Inmate

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ inmate
Difficulty 14
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical
@ inmate
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical

Base level 12
Base experience 272
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium

An inmate:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • can be seen through infravision.

The inmate is a monster added in the Convict patch, implemented in UnNetHack, DynaHack, dNetHack, and SlashTHEM. The inmate is the Convict quest quest guardian.

Despite their name and status, inmates do not count as prisoners who can be freed to raise your alignment record.

References

Reference: Karl Garrison's Convict Patch

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Inmate&oldid=148522"

The '''inmate''' is a [[monster]] added in the [[Convict|Convict patch]], implemented in [[UnNetHack]], [[DynaHack]], [[dNetHack]], and [[SlashTHEM]]. The inmate is the [[Convict quest]] [[Quest guardian|quest guardian]].

Despite their name and status, inmates do not count as [[prisoner]]s who can be [[Alignment record#Ways to alter your alignment|freed to raise your alignment record]].
